name: Global LightBG Desert Sepia Medium Contrast
description:
Built upon Solarized Dark Modified Colors. I discovered that adjusting my monitor to minimum brightness and using this style allowed a nice contrast so text was easy to read.

Any portion of my own code I release as CC0
additional_info:
v platinum Budruk - made all fonts the same

v premium albuquerque (switched to naming of versions rather than numbers)

v9 added lowercase functionality

v8 bg slightly brighter

v7 because ortholinear keyboards

v6 because tables

v4 fix links, fix facebook

v3 mobile fix

Edit 2: it's a bit better
